properties.name: Ethics
properties.description: Posted by IchbinThere was a cafe here that Agustin, John, I, and many others hung out at for a year. It was run by a smooth-talking and sticky-fingered southerner who poured a lot of wine and told many tall tales. It was owned by a Angelo, a crazy Italian who also ran an Italian restaurant in the back. Years before, Sam and I had gone to the restaurant and orderd wine, although we were underage, and had left in a hurry because we didn\'t have the money to leave a decent tip.

properties.name: Graduate Center
properties.description: Posted by IchbinThis is the academic center where my mom worked as a secretary when we lived in Richland. She met Judy there, who later married my uncle David. I rember walking here along the river from my grandmother\'s house on a couple of occasions, and remember thinking that was a very long way.

properties.name: Grandma's House
properties.description: Posted by Ichbin 1424 Hunt Richland WAThis was my Grandmother and Grandfather\'s house, where my mom brought me when I was born and where we lived until I was about 4. I remember playing in the surrounding trees, in the playground across the street, and the neighbors Natilie & Frank, who were friends of my grandparents. My grandfather died here in 1990, and my grandmother moved out around 1995.

properties.name: Hagget Hall
properties.description: Posted by IchbinHere is the dormitory I lived in for my first two years at the UW. In 1988-89, I lived in the north tower. In 1989-90, I lived in the South tower. In my second year, I met Samantha, and we moved out together.

properties.name: High School
properties.description: Posted by Ichbin This is MIHS, where I attended high school from 1984-1988. In my senior year, I took humanities block from Ruth (Cly) Newman and Milt Yanicks, and physics from Jim Minstrell.

properties.name: Honey Bear Bakery
properties.description: Posted by IchbinWhen I lived down the street, this was the Honey Bear Bakery. A big, friendly wooden bear statue stood outside. We often hung out here.

properties.name: Jens's House
properties.description: Posted by IchbinThis is where my best friend, Jens, lived with his mom, until his mom moved to Eugene, OR and he moved to his Dad\'s on the south end of the island.

properties.name: Marina
properties.description: Posted by IchbinThis is Shilshole Marina. I participated in Wednesday night sailboat races here, first as a graduate student in Derek Storm\'s boat, then again during my early Microsoft years in my officemate Alex Krawarik\'s boat.

properties.name: Mercer Island House
properties.description: Posted by IchbinMy mom and Al bought this house when we moved to Seattle, and I attended middle school and high school while living here.

properties.name: Middle School
properties.description: Posted by Ichbin This is Islander Middle School, where I attended the 8th grade in 1984. I hung out with a lot of geeks at lunch playing computer games. Sometimes I used my lunch money to buy a floppy disk instead of eating lunch.

properties.name: My First House
properties.description: Posted by Ichbin4316 37th Ave NE Seattle WA 98105This is the first house I bought. I bought it along with Maria in November 2003. It used to belong to Jacob Lawrence.

properties.name: Ortiz House
properties.description: Posted by IchbinI rented a room in this house from Luana Ortiz when I started grad school in 1995. Jim was also a house-mate. Heike visited me here and we fell in love during the summer of 1996.

properties.name: Rental House
properties.description: Posted by Ichbin5115 39th Ave NE 98105Maria and I rented this house in 2001, shortly after I started working at Microsoft.

properties.name: UW Nuclear Physics Lab
properties.description: Posted by IchbinHere is the nuclear accelerator where I started working as an operator while I was an undergraduate, then worked as a research assistant when I first started graduate school.

properties.name: UW Physics Building
properties.description: Posted by IchbinHere is where I attended graduate in physics school from 1995 to 1998.

properties.name: University Towers Appartments
properties.description: Posted by IchbinI moved in here with Jen and two other girls in 1997. I kept the appartment after Jen and I broke up, and kept it until I finished grad school. Jim, Tara, John, Agustin, Christian, and Swati were all roommates at various times. There was a ricktey old elevator with a cage door.

properties.name: Work
properties.description: Posted by IchbinBuilding 42 is where I started working at Microsoft in April 2001.
